Atom - my new go-to texteditor

13 Jul 2017

I used Textwrangler as my universal text editor and it did a good job. But since I discovered Atom I feel like I missed a few years of development.
Here is a quick overview of what I discovered so far:

  • you can install custom packages, e.g. for Jekyll or a markdown preview
  • Git support is built in
  • custom themes, e.g. dark
  • it is free

Iâ€™ll keep digging and post new discoveries.
